trans-unit.source: Describes a change in the scrolling state and contains the required arguments for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Descrive una modifica nello stato di scorrimento e contiene gli argomenti necessari per un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollChanged"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the updated height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> extent.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'altezza aggiornata del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> extent.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated extent height.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta l'altezza dell'extent aggiornata.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the change in height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> extent.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica la modifica dell'altezza di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> extent.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the change in extent height.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta la modifica dell'altezza dell'extent.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the updated width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> extent.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la larghezza aggiornata del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> extent.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated extent width.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta la larghezza dell'extent aggiornata.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the change in width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> extent.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica la modifica della larghezza di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> extent.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the change in extent width.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta la modifica della larghezza dell'extent.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the change in horizontal offset for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica la modifica dell'offset orizzontale di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the change in horizontal offset for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta la modifica dell'offset orizzontale di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the updated horizontal offset value for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore di offset orizzontale aggiornato per un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated value of the horizontal offset for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta il valore aggiornato dell'offset orizzontale per un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Performs proper type casting before invoking the type-safe <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventHandler"></xref> delegate
trans-unit.target: Esegue il cast del tipo appropriato prima di richiamare l'indipendente dai tipi <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventHandler"> </xref> delegato

trans-unit.source: If you provide either the `genericHandler` or `genericTarget` as a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), exceptions are raised.
trans-unit.target: Se viene fornito il `genericHandler` o `genericTarget` come un riferimento null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), vengono generate eccezioni.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to invoke, in this case the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventHandler"></xref> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore dell'evento da richiamare, in questo caso il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventHandler"> </xref> delegato.

trans-unit.source: The target upon which the `genericHandler` is invoked.
trans-unit.target: La destinazione sulla quale il `genericHandler` viene richiamato.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the change in vertical offset of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica la modifica dell'offset verticale di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the change in vertical offset of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta la modifica dell'offset verticale di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the updated value of the vertical offset for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore aggiornato dell'offset verticale per un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated vertical offset of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta l'offset verticale aggiornato di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the updated value of the viewport height for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore aggiornato dell'altezza del viewport per un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated viewport height of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta l'altezza del viewport aggiornata una <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the change in value of the viewport height for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica la modifica del valore dell'altezza del viewport per un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the change in vertical viewport height for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta la modifica dell'altezza del viewport verticale per un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the updated value of the viewport width for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore aggiornato della larghezza del viewport per un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated value of the viewport width for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta il valore aggiornato della larghezza del viewport per un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the change in viewport width of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica la modifica della larghezza del viewport di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the change in viewport width for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Double>che rappresenta la modifica della larghezza del viewport per un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Double>
